item.title: The Kill Chain
item.description: The Cyber Kill Chain framework is designed for identification and prevention of the network intrusions. The term kill chain is used in millitary to refer to the steps taken by an adversary to reach its ultimate goal.

item.title: Wireshark
item.description: Tool used to analyze network traffic. The GOAT.

item.title: fuzzy hashing
item.description: Fuzzy hashing helps us to perform similarity analysis - match two files with minor differences based on the fuzzy hash values. One of the examples of fuzzy hashing is the usage of SSDeep.

item.title: Welcome to my Knowledgebase

item.title: Bandwidth vs Throughput
item.description: Bandwidth It is the total capacity of a network to transfer data over an interval of time. It is measured in kbps, mbps, gbps. Throughput It is also the capacity of network to transfer data but also considers latency and other factors.

item.title: DNS
item.description: abbr. Domain Name System Manual Lookup > nslookup google.com Server: dns.google Address: 8.8.8.8 Non-authoritative answer: Name: google.com Addresses: 2404:6800:4002:826::200e 142.250.195.14.
